scripts.build: cd ../shared && npm run build && cd ../backend && npx tsc
scripts.postbuild: cpy 'staticData/badwordsData/**/*.json' '../build/backend/staticData/badwordsData' && cp package.json ../build/backend/package.json && cp ../shared/package.json ../build/shared/package.json & cd ../build/backend && npm install --omit=dev && cd ../shared && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.compile: cd ../shared && npm run build && cd ../backend && bun build server.ts --target node --outfile ../build/server.js
